bibl.title: Julian or Constantine? Observations on a Fragmentary Imperial Panegyric.
bibl.note: P. lit. Lond. 163 (= Pack2 2573) + M.P.E.R., N.S. I, 14 = (Pack2 2531). Proposes to identify the emperor praised in the anonymous panegyric as Constantine rather than Julian.
bibl.seg: BARNES Timothy D., Julian or Constantine? Observations on a Fragmentary Imperial Panegyric.
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. I (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 67-70.
P. lit. Lond. 163 (= Pack2 2573) + M.P.E.R., N.S. I, 14 = (Pack2 2531). Proposes to identify the emperor praised in the anonymous panegyric as Constantine rather than Julian.
